actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that the House of Heroes project in Columbus, Georgia, should serve as a model for public service support for the Nation's veterans.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the House of Heroes project of Columbus, Georgia, should serve as a public service model for communities across the United States to provide needed assistance and support for veterans.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that the House of Heroes project in Columbus, Georgia, should serve as a model for public service support for the Nation's veterans.
